headline: Fluidra, Aiper, and Maytronics Shape Competitive Landscape in Rapidly Growing Pool Cleaner Market | Automatic Pool Cleaner Market Report 2025-2030
summary: Robotic pool cleaners lead with over 51% share, while the residential segment dominates overall demand. North America holds the largest market share (44%), with the Middle East & Africa showing the fastest growth (11.22% CAGR). Trends include AI-driven navigation, IoT-enabled smart connectivity, and cordless technology.
